job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We are looking for a talented software engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and testing software applications.
job.requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. 3+ years of experience in software development. Proficiency in Python and Java.

resume.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for building innovative and scalable applications.
resume.skills: Python, Java, JavaScript, SQL, Git, Docker, Kubernetes
resume.education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science - University of California, Berkeley
resume.experience:
Software Engineer - Example Inc. (2020-Present)
- Developed and maintained web applications using Python and Django.
- Collaborated with a team of engineers to design and implement new features.
resume.projects:
Personal Portfolio Website - Built a personal website using React and Node.js.
Machine Learning Project - Developed a machine learning model to predict customer churn.
